events.title: Blockchain & Fintech Bootcamp
events.description: An intensive bootcamp covering blockchain technology and its applications in the fintech industry.

events.title: KlimaDAO: Fighting Climate Change through DeFi
events.description: Exploring how decentralized finance (DeFi) can be used to combat climate change through initiatives like KlimaDAO.

events.title: Electric Capital: VC in Web3
events.description: Understanding venture capital (VC) investments in the Web3 space, focusing on blockchain and decentralized technologies.

events.title: Women in Web3 & Fintech
events.description: Highlighting the contributions and experiences of women in the Web3 and fintech sectors.

events.title: An Introduction to Cryptoderivatives
events.description: A primer on cryptocurrency derivatives and their role in the digital asset markets.

events.title: Harmonic Chain: Crypto & Regulation
events.description: Examining the regulatory aspects of cryptocurrencies and their impact on the Harmonic Chain ecosystem.

events.title: Binance Academy: DeFi on Binance
events.description: Exploring decentralized finance (DeFi) projects and opportunities within the Binance ecosystem.

events.title: The Ethics of Web3
events.description: Discussing ethical considerations and challenges in the development and adoption of Web3 technologies.

events.title: B&F Capstone
events.description: The culmination of the Blockchain & Fintech program, involving a comprehensive capstone project.

events.title: Fundamentals of Blockchain & Fintech
events.description: A foundational course covering the basics of blockchain technology and its applications in fintech.

events.title: Curve, Gammaswap, Gamma Strategies, Premia Finance: A Tour of DeFi
events.description: Taking a tour of various DeFi platforms and strategies, including Curve, Gammaswap, and Premia Finance.

events.title: The Political Economy of Crypto & Libertarian Philosophy
events.description: Exploring the political and economic implications of cryptocurrencies and their connection to libertarian philosophy.

events.title: An Introduction to Zero-Knowledge Proofs
events.description: Introducing the concept of zero-knowledge proofs and their applications in blockchain and cryptography.

events.title: dYdX: An Introduction to Perpetual Futures
events.description: Learning about perpetual futures contracts and their role in cryptocurrency trading on the dYdX platform.

events.title: Marcum LLP: Essentials of Crypto Accounting
events.description: Covering the essential principles and practices of accounting for cryptocurrencies, offered by Marcum LLP.

events.title: CertiK: Foundations of Smart Contract Security
events.description: Building a solid understanding of smart contract security fundamentals with CertiK's course.

events.title: EY & Deloitte: Blockchain for Businesses
events.description: Understanding the fundamentals of enterprise use cases for blockchain technology, and the world of blockchain consulting.
